resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: "Information in Case of a Negative Test Result"

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "If you have a valid vaccination certificate or certificate of recovery and add a test certificate in the app, they are shown in a combined display in the certificate overview. You can switch between the QR code of the vaccination certificate or certificate of recovery and the test certificate by using the appropriate control. Both QR codes must be verified by the CovPassCheck app if proof of 2G+ is required."
"If you receive a negative test result, you will now receive additional recommendations if you still have acute symptoms."
"Since Version 2.12, a security notification is displayed if administrator rights are active on your smartphone. You can hide this notification until the next update."
"The scanning feature has been revised to enable even more reliable recognition and scanning of QR codes."
